title: 【警察演員】再被拍到扮演黑衣暴徒後結伴上警車回府
contents:
“暴民”“結束工作” #HongKong ，然後乘上#Police警車，以便之後回派出所並記錄其加班時間。 #HongKongProtests#FreeHongKong#PoliceState#PoliceBrutality



[url=https://mobile.twitter.com/ajmm19923493][/url]
[url=https://mobile.twitter.com/ajmm19923493][/url]ajmm 
@ajmm19923493
[url=https://mobile.twitter.com/ajmm19923493][/url]


“Rioters” calling it a day in #HongKong, and got on #Police car so they could head back to police station and logged in their overtime hours.

#HongKongProtests #FreeHongKong #PoliceState #PoliceBrutality
翻譯推文
